briefdescription.para: Flag for indicating if the VerovioText font is currently used.

detaileddescription.para: If used, it has to be initialized to false (e.g., in the overriden version of StartPage) and will be changed in DeviceContext::VrvTextFont

briefdescription.para: Add id, data-id and class attributes.
In SVG use global styling but not with mm output (for pdf generation)
Setting mm output flag (false by default)
Setter for indent of the SVG (default is 3, -1 for tabs)
Set the SVG to have 'raw' formatting, with no extraneous whitespace or newlines.
Removes the xlink: prefex on href attributes, necessary for some newer browsers.
Copy the content of a file to the output stream.

briefdescription.para: This class implements a drawing context for generating SVG files.

detaileddescription.para: The music font is embedded by incorporating ./data/[fontname]/[glyph].xml glyphs within the SVG file.
